Definition at line 145 of file data_extension_access.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $id = $this->Security->get( $id , 'integer' );
                        $Type = $this->Security->get( $Type , 'command' );
                        $Name = $this->Security->get( $Name , 'command' );
                        
                        $LinkType = $this->Link->get_link_type( $Type , 'data_extension' );
                        
                        $Records = $this->Database->select( 
                              '*' , 'umx_data_extension' , 
                              "( $this->AddLimitations ) AND object_id = $id AND type = $LinkType AND name LIKE '$Name'"
                        );
                        if( isset( $Records[ 0 ] ) )
                        {
                              return( get_field( $Records[ 0 ] , 'data' ) );
                        }

                        $Records = $this->Database->insert( 
                              'umx_data_extension' , 'object_id , type , name' , "$id , $LinkType , '$Name'"
                        );
                        $this->Database->commit();
                        
                        return( '' );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

Definition at line 207 of file data_extension_access.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $Data = $this->Security->get( $Data , 'string' );
                        
                        $OldData = $this->get_data( $id , $Type , $Name );

                        if( $OldData != $Data )
                        {
                              $id = $this->Security->get( $id , 'integer' );
                              $Type = $this->Security->get( $Type , 'command' );
                              $Name = $this->Security->get( $Name , 'command' );
                              
                              $LinkType = $this->Link->get_link_type( $Type , 'data_extension' );
                        
                              $this->Database->update( 
                                    'umx_data_extension' , array( 'data' ) , array( "'$Data'" ) , 
                                    "( $this->AddLimitations ) AND object_id = $id AND type = $LinkType AND name LIKE '$Name'"
                              );
                              $this->Database->commit();
                        }
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
